title: MIRMARU Men's Wool Blend Baseball Cap with Adjustable Size Strap
features: Material - Made of 50% wool and 50% polyester. It is soft and durable wool blend hat. Great insulation hats for winter seasons.
Size - One size fits most. It has an adjustable metal buckle for perfect size.

Detail - The baseball cap is always great basic item to have. The crown is made of 6 panels of wool blend fiber and sewn eyelets in each panel for ventilation. Specially, adjustable straps give you perfect size fit.

Features - not only provides the sun shading as a regular cap, but also provides warm feeling in cold days. Also, It is super easy outfit accessory which never fails. Easy and great match items with any outfits.

Baseball hats make the perfect basic accessory. Asides from the fact that they look cute, they shield your face from the sun, they are great for hiding messy hair in humid weather, and they are ideal for outdoor activities. Pair them with a casual or formal outfit and you've got that cool-girl or boy look.
description: Baseball caps never go wrong! A classic style/addition to any look!
Check out the impressive specs. With 6 panels, 4" crown, stitched eyelets, and high quality wool blend fiber, you'll experience the difference the moment you place this cap on your head.
Baseball hats have been around forever!
